metadata.title: Enable audit Logs
metadata.description: Enable audit Logs

metadata.title: Ensure that the cluster-admin role is only used where required
metadata.description: Ensure that the cluster-admin role is only used where required

metadata.title: Minimize access to secrets
metadata.description: Minimize access to secrets

metadata.title: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles

metadata.description: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles

metadata.description: Minimize access to create pods

metadata.title: Ensure that default service accounts are not actively used.
metadata.description: Ensure that default service accounts are not actively used.

metadata.title: Avoid use of system:masters group
metadata.description: Avoid use of system:masters group

metadata.title: Minimize the admission of privileged containers
metadata.description: Minimize the admission of privileged containers

metadata.description: Minimize the admission of containers with allowPrivilegeEscalation

metadata.title: Ensure that all Namespaces have Network Policies defined
metadata.description: Ensure that all Namespaces have Network Policies defined

metadata.title: Prefer using secrets as files over secrets as environment variables
metadata.description: Prefer using secrets as files over secrets as environment variables

metadata.title: The default namespace should not be used
metadata.description: The default namespace should not be used

metadata.title: Ensure Image Vulnerability Scanning using Amazon ECR image scanning or a third party provider
metadata.description: Ensure Image Vulnerability Scanning using Amazon ECR image scanning or a third party provider

metadata.title: Prefer using dedicated EKS Service Accounts
metadata.description: Prefer using dedicated EKS Service Accounts

shellcommand_test.comment: Ensure 'aws eks describe-cluster --name ${CLUSTER_NAME} --query "cluster.logging.clusterLogging"' output Pattern Match '"enabled": true' (string)

Ensure 'for node in $(kubectl get nodes -o jsonpath='{.items[*].metadata.name}'); do kubectl exec -it file-check -- stat -c %a /host/var/lib/kubelet/kubeconfig; done' output Pattern Match '644' (string)

Ensure 'for node in $(kubectl get nodes -o jsonpath='{.items[*].metadata.name}'); do kubectl exec -it file-check -- stat -c %a /host/var/lib/kubelet/kubeconfig; done' output Pattern Match '640' (string)

Ensure 'for node in $(kubectl get nodes -o jsonpath='{.items[*].metadata.name}'); do kubectl exec -it file-check -- stat -c %U:%G /host/var/lib/kubelet/kubeconfig; done' output Pattern Match 'root:root' (string)

Ensure 'for node in $(kubectl get nodes -o jsonpath='{.items[*].metadata.name}'); do kubectl exec -it file-check -- stat -c %a /host/etc/kubernetes/kubelet/kubelet-config.json; done' output Pattern Match '644' (string)

Ensure 'for node in $(kubectl get nodes -o jsonpath='{.items[*].metadata.name}'); do kubectl exec -it file-check -- stat -c %a /host/etc/kubernetes/kubelet/kubelet-config.json; done' output Pattern Match '640' (string)

Ensure 'for node in $(kubectl get nodes -o jsonpath='{.items[*].metadata.name}'); do kubectl exec -it file-check -- stat -c %U:%G /host/etc/kubernetes/kubelet/kubelet-config.json; done' output Pattern Match 'root:root' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl get clusterrolebindings -o json' output Pattern Match 'cluster-admin' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl auth can-i get,list,watch secrets --all-namespaces --as=system:authenticated' output Pattern Match 'no' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl get roles --all-namespaces -o yaml' output Pattern Match '"*"' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl get clusterroles -o yaml' output Pattern Match '"*"' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl auth can-i create pods --all-namespaces --as=system:authenticated' output Pattern Match 'no' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl get serviceaccounts/$SERVICE_ACCOUNT -o yaml' output Pattern Match 'automountServiceAccountToken.*false' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl get serviceaccounts/$SERVICE_ACCOUNT -o yaml' output Pattern Match 'automountServiceAccountToken.*false' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl get pods/$POD -o yaml' output Pattern Match 'automountServiceAccountToken.*false' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl get clusterrolebinding cluster-admin -o json' output Pattern Not Match 'system:masters' (string)

Ensure 'kubectl get pods --all-namespaces -o json | jq '.items[] | select(.metadata.namespace != "kube-system" and .spec.containers[]?.securityContext?.privileged == true) | {pod: .metadata.name, namespace: .metadata.namespace, container: .spec.containers

Ensure 'kubectl get pods --all-namespaces -o json | jq '.items[] | select(.metadata.namespace != "kube-system" and .spec.hostPID == true) | {pod: .metadata.name, namespace: .metadata.namespace, container: .spec.containers[].name}'' output Pattern Not Matc

Ensure 'kubectl get pods --all-namespaces -o json | jq '.items[] | select(.metadata.namespace != "kube-system" and .spec.hostIPC == true) | {pod: .metadata.name, namespace: .metadata.namespace, container: .spec.containers[].name}'' output Pattern Not Matc

Ensure 'kubectl get pods --all-namespaces -o json | jq '.items[] | select(.metadata.namespace != "kube-system" and .spec.hostNetwork == true) | {pod: .metadata.name, namespace: .metadata.namespace, container: .spec.containers[].name}'' output Pattern Not

Ensure 'kubectl get pods --all-namespaces -o json | jq '.items[] | select(.metadata.namespace != "kube-system" and .spec.containers[]; .securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation == true) | {pod: .metadata.name, namespace: .metadata.namespace, container: .s
Ensure 'kubectl get networkpolicy --all-namespaces' output Pattern Not Match '.+' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl get all -o jsonpath='{range .items[?(@..secretKeyRef)]} {.kind} {.metadata.name} {"\n"}{end}' -A' output Pattern Match '.+' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl get pods -n default' output Pattern Not Match '.+' (string)
Ensure 'aws ecr describe-repositories --repository-names $REPO_NAME --region $REGION_CODE' output Pattern Match '"scanOnPush": true' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl get serviceaccounts/$SERVICE_ACCOUNT -o yaml' output Pattern Match 'automountServiceAccountToken.*false' (string)
Ensure 'aws eks describe-cluster --name ${CLUSTER_NAME} --query "cluster.resourcesVpcConfig.endpointPublicAccess"' output Pattern Match 'true' (string)
Ensure 'aws eks describe-cluster --name ${CLUSTER_NAME} --query "cluster.resourcesVpcConfig.endpointPrivateAccess"' output Pattern Match 'true' (string)
Ensure 'aws eks describe-cluster --name ${CLUSTER_NAME} --query "cluster.resourcesVpcConfig.endpointPublicAccess"' output Pattern Match 'false' (string)
Ensure 'aws eks describe-cluster --name ${CLUSTER_NAME} --query "cluster.resourcesVpcConfig.endpointPrivateAccess"' output Pattern Match 'true' (string)
Ensure 'aws eks describe-cluster --name ${CLUSTER_NAME} --query "cluster.resourcesVpcConfig.endpointPublicAccess"' output Pattern Match 'true' (string)
Ensure 'aws eks describe-cluster --name ${CLUSTER_NAME} --query "cluster.resourcesVpcConfig.endpointPrivateAccess"' output Pattern Match 'true' (string)
Ensure 'aws eks describe-cluster --name ${CLUSTER_NAME} --query "cluster.resourcesVpcConfig.clusterSecurityGroupId"' output Pattern Not Match '" "' (string)
Ensure 'aws eks describe-addon --cluster-name ${CLUSTER_NAME} --addon-name vpc-cni --query addon.configurationValues' output Pattern Match '"enableNetworkPolicy": "true"' (string)

process58_test.comment: Ensure that the --read-only-port argument is set to 0

textfilecontent54_test.comment: Ensure at least one file named /etc/systemd/system/kubelet.service.d/10-kubeadm.conf exists and matches pattern ^.*KUBELET_SYSTEM_PODS_ARGS.+--read-only-port=0.+$
